name: Scovillain
description: The Spicy Pepper Pokémon. The red head converts spicy chemicals into fire energy and blasts the surrounding area with a super spicy stream of flame.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s speed is doubled in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to sleep.

abilities.name: Moody
abilities.description: At the end of each long rest, this Pokémon rerolls on the nature table, replacing its nature with the result until the next long rest.
